    #include <iostream>
    #include <iomanip>
    using namespace std;
    int main(){
    int withdraw;
    float cash;
    cin >> withdraw >> cash;
    if(cash-0.5>=withdraw && withdraw%5==0)
    cout << setprecision(2) << showpoint << fixed << (cash-0.50) - withdraw << endl;
    else if (cash-0.5>withdraw && withdraw%5!=0)
    cout << setprecision(2) << showpoint << fixed << cash << endl;
    else
    cout << setprecision(2) << showpoint << fixed << cash << endl;
    return 0;
    }
